Package xyz.controllers

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
xyz.controllers.BaseController
xyz.controllers.AdminController
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.javalin.http.Handler
public class AdminController
extends BaseController
Admin Controller represents the main controller dashboard and provides access to internal model routes for the purposes of the application. Provides general dashboard utility elements and presentation.
